title: Why is it that vehicles in North Carolina driven by people that have moved and living here do not and cannot seem to get North Carolina plates.  I think its unfair for them to keep riding around with other state plates on their vehicle if they are established in NC with an address. More attention should be focused on this , plus its taking revenue away from NC which it so desperately needs, Thanks
